author: Vlad7
post_text: January 27, 2017 at 2:38 PM#1Hey guys!I'm not able to create new variable...Ex:setvar $allred= image 1 + 2 + 3 + 4In the command line it appeas like this:Executig: SetVar (in green) $allred= Image (in green) 1 + 2 + 3 + 4(All the + mark are in green too)But when i write Listvar in the commandline .. i didn't see my new $allred variable in the list..Any idea..i mean..every variable i try to add it doesn't work at all..thanks guy!

posts.author: Vlad7
posts.post_text: January 27, 2017 at 2:38 PM#1Hey guys!I'm not able to create new variable...Ex:setvar $allred= image 1 + 2 + 3 + 4In the command line it appeas like this:Executig: SetVar (in green) $allred= Image (in green) 1 + 2 + 3 + 4(All the + mark are in green too)But when i write Listvar in the commandline .. i didn't see my new $allred variable in the list..Any idea..i mean..every variable i try to add it doesn't work at all..thanks guy!

posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: January 27, 2017 at 2:45 PM#2You need to enclose the entire string in quotes. setvar $allred = "image 1 + 2 + 3 + 4"

posts.author: Vlad7
posts.post_text: January 27, 2017 at 5:41 PM#3Thanks a lot..works fine !!!

posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: January 30, 2017 at 3:17 AM#9Whoa, hold on a sec there. I think you might need to go through theVariables tutorialagain. (Also, maybe take a look atthis webinar(open link in new tab)).There are global variables and user variables. Set/Add/ListVar deal with global variables. Set/Add/ListUserVar deal with user variables. If you do SetUserVar, you won't see the resulting variable with ListVar, because you created a user variable, but are listing global variables.

posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: January 30, 2017 at 2:28 PM#11So when you execute Setvar $chase="Executor 101 + 102 + 103" and then type Listvar, your command line doesn't show you the variable $chase? What user rights does the user you're logged-in as have? When was the last time you saved and reloaded your showfile? Or restarted the console / onPC you're working on?
